thread.title: BRIEF-Vivendi takes an equity interest in Ubisoft And Gameloft
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Vivendi takes an equity interest in Ubisoft And Gameloft

title: BRIEF-Vivendi takes an equity interest in Ubisoft And Gameloft
text:
BRIEF-Vivendi takes an equity interest in Ubisoft And Gameloft 
Oct 14 Vivendi : 
* Takes an equity interest in Ubisoft and Gameloft 
* Has taken equity stakes of 6.6 pct and 6.2 pct respectively in Ubisoft and Gameloft 
* This represents an acquisition on the market of 7.36 million Ubisoft shares for 140.3 million euros ($160.5 million) and 5.24 million Gameloft shares for 19.7 million euros Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8740 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
